key_decisions: Extended Worker model with currentTask, progress, and lastActivity fields
Added WorkerProgress type for structured progress tracking (current/total/description)
Implemented subscribe/unsubscribe WebSocket message types for worker updates
Added onWorkerChange callback system to worker-store for decoupled status broadcasting
Extended ClientConnection to track workerSubscriptions and subscribedToAll flags
Added broadcastWorkerStatus function to push updates to subscribed clients
